short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Effortlessly search, filter, and organize your Twitter likes across devices with our powerful and privacy-focused tool.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
💻How To Use
1. Click on Xearch icon to open the popup interface
2. Sign in to your Twitter/X account
3. Go to your Twitter/X likes page. Xearch will automatically begin syncing your tweets. Keep this page open until synchronization is complete.
4. Click on Xearch icon again to view the real-time synchronization status

📒Note
When you're signed in, Xearch typically syncs automatically on the likes page. There's no need to manually click a "re-sync" button to update all tweets. The "re-sync" option is only necessary if you inadvertently closed the sync page, interrupting the process.

🔥Features
    🔍 Easy Search: Quickly locate your liked tweets without endless scrolling.
    ⚡ Rapid Browsing: Instantly load results, saving you valuable time.
    🔄 Real-Time Sync: Automatically updates with your latest likes, keeping results current.
    🌐 Cross-Device Access: Seamlessly use on any device with your search.
    🎨 Customizable: Tailor search parameters for a personalized experience.
    🚀 Regular Updates: We continuously improve features to ensure the best search experience.
    🔐 Privacy Focused: Secure and reliable, we don't store your personal data.

Change Log
v0.1.8
- Fix resource loading issues caused by CSP

v0.1.7
- Add display of last synchronization time status

v0.1.6
- Present web application notifications conditionally based on available data

v0.1.5
- Add an entry point for the web-enhanced version interface
- Implement a 500-tweet limit for tweets (due to operational costs)
- Optimize the styling of other popup pages
